sentences.en: Wow, that fast? Heh. Belive me, I know.
sentences.cn: 哇哦，那么快？嘿嘿，相信我，我知道的。

sentences.en: But you're fat enough as it is! Heh, only joking baby!
sentences.cn: 但是你已经足够胖了，嘿，讲笑而已。

sentences.en: Heh - heh - heh, I got the whole information from the upperclassman.
sentences.cn: 嘿-嘿-嘿，我从学长那儿得到了所有的消息。
